name: schnapsfiguren.com
overview:
Using your photo as references, schnapsfiguren.com professional sculptors and artists can create custom caricature figurines made to look like you or your loved one!

The heads are hand sculpted of polymer clay; it is about 2 inches high, so very tiny tools are used to sculpt the details in each cake topper or figurine. Each head is custom-made according to your photos. These choices include skin tone, eye color and hair color.

A Custom and Personalized Caricature Figurine would be a creative and unique gift idea for any occasion, Wedding, Anniversary, Bridesmaid, Groomsmen, Bridal Gifts, Engagement Gifts, Romantic Gifts, Valentine’s Day, Christmas & Holiday, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Retirement, Thank You Gifts, Baby Shower Gifts, Birthday Gifts, Graduation, Corporate Gifts and more.
